page.title: 07Employment, Swainby & Potto
page.content: The largest enterprise is Potto Hall Club, with 20 permanant and some part- time staff.Others include a coach firm at Ingleby Arncliffe with 8 buses, an engineering fabrication workshop at Swainby with 8 men, 3 garages,6 public houses,2 builders,a joiner/undertaker, and the retail shops which are family concerns. The 25 farms employ 2 perm- anant and some seasonal labour. Male breadwinners in{Swainby}are 20 self employed, 2 in local government, 4 council workers, 9 professionals, 10 industrialists, 2 directors, a vicar, a policeman, a fireman and 2 unemploy- ed; 64 are retired and 4 work away. {Potto}has 10 self employed, 10 ICI, 4 professionals, 3 in local government, 3 drivers, 2 salesmen, a solicitor's clerk, a newspaper editor, a fireman, and no unemployed; 12 are retired and 5 work away.
